body.p:
The PDU can be shut down by its monitoring system with a signal to trip the main breaker. Both the WaveStar and WaveStar Infinity Monitoring Systems will trip the main breaker if any of the following signals is received:
Local EPO signal
Remote EPO (REPO) signal
Signal that thermal wires have registered a temperature in the transformer core that exceeds the specified temperature limit
Signal that an optional shutdown option has been triggered (see ).
